Text:
Firstly, thanks to all involved in producing this file.
However, this has a non-standard VBR audio stream of less than 128kbps, using "Writing Application: Lavf53.2.0", according to MediaInfo.
This audio will not play on some hardware media players, including PopcornHour. It can be fixed by remuxing with say, AviDemux, but it's a PITA.
To LOL encoders, only some of you are doing this. Could you please use another app, such as transcode-1.0.6, that doesn't cause this problem, as was used for Ep 1.   
Once again, thanks.
i downloaded this ep but when i click play theres just a black screen, i can hear the sound though. why is this
Great torrent, good quality. Thanks very much.
